CustomField.description: Use a semi-colon separated list if to exclude the values from the Group By. For example, if the object is Case and the columns are Grouped on the field Status. To exclude "New" and "Closed" cases, enter in this field: New;Closed
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use a semi-colon separated list if to exclude the values from the Group By. For example, if the object is Case and the columns are Grouped on the field Status. To exclude "New" and "Closed" cases, enter in this field: New;Closed
CustomField.label: Values To Exclude From Group By
